branchCategory.name: AL30-60, AL Lubricator with Tank
branchCategory.description: <P>Series AL modular style lubricators provide accurate lubrication of downstream equipment. The oil drop rate is adjustable depending on equipment requirements. The modular AL design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment. </P>
